title: the Undying Flame
intro: Wǔjiàng is named the strongest warrior in the history of Huoshen, the bastion of Chìzú. His resonance ability, the Undying Flame, originally belonged to the Paragon, Phoenix, but was shared to him when he defended the Bastion from one of the strongest Hellspawns, with the cost of his life. The flame resurrected him and fused with his original fire-bending ability. Since then, he continued to wield his Soulforge, Liánhuǒ, to defeat anyone who is foolish enough to harm the Bastion or the Empress of the Holy Fire, his saviour.

abilities.name: Blazing Bulwark
abilities.details:
Wǔjiàng generates an Blazing Bulwark[/] stack whenever he takes damage from an enemy hero or deals damage with an ability or basic attack. If Wǔjiàng has a Blazing Bulwark[/] stack, his body will be surrounding by flame, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to nearby enemies per second.

Each stack increases the damage dealt. At maximum Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, each time the flame deals damage, it will [bf]heal[/] Wujiang for a [bf]percentage of the damage dealt[/].

abilities.name: Fearless Smash
abilities.details:
Wǔjiàng leaps to a target enemy, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).

At maximum Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, Fearless Smash will also deal damage to surrounding enemies in a small radius around the target, and slightly [db]knock them back[/].

abilities.name: Inferno Fists
abilities.details:
Wǔjiàng channels flame on his fists, empowering his basic attacks to deal [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to surrounding enemies in a small radius around the target.

At maximum Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, he gains [bf]increased attack speed[/].

abilities.name: Seismic Kick
abilities.details:
Wǔjiàng kicks the ground, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all nearby enemies in a small radius and slowing them for a short duration.

At maximum Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, the impact will first [db]knock up[/] the enemies, before slowing them down.

abilities.name: Undying Flame
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng embraces the blessing of the Phoenix, becoming a temporary avatar of pure, unyielding fire. He instantly gains [bf]maximum[/] <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, and takes [bf]reduced incoming damage[/] by a significant percentage for the next few seconds.
